Destiny Concepts.quote: What is ordained by destiny can never be changed. (Bhagavad Gita 2:27)

Divine Plan.quote: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future. (Jeremiah 29:11)

Fate.quote: No soul knows what it will earn tomorrow, and no soul knows in what land it will die. (Quran 31:34)

Predestination.quote: For those whom He foreknew He also predestined to be conformed to the image of His Son. (Romans 8:29)

Karma.quote: As you sow, so shall you reap. (Galatians 6:7)

Divine Purpose.quote: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, before you were born I set you apart. (Jeremiah 1:5)

Sacred Path.quote: Your path is laid out before you, but you must choose to walk it. (Native American Proverb)

Cosmic Order.quote: Rita (Universal Order) is the foundation of all existence. (Rig Veda 10.85)

Divine Time.quote: To everything there is a season, and a time to every purpose under heaven. (Ecclesiastes 3:1)

Destiny Fulfillment.quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how. (Friedrich Nietzsche)

Divine Choice.quote: Choose this day whom you will serve. (Joshua 24:15)

Spiritual Journey.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. (Tao Te Ching, Chapter 64)

Divine Calling.quote: Many are called, but few are chosen. (Matthew 22:14)

Life Purpose.quote: Each soul has its own destiny and path to enlightenment. (Buddhist Teaching)

Divine Direction.quote: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding. (Proverbs 3:5)

Cosmic Design.quote: The universe is not only queerer than we suppose, but queerer than we can suppose. (J.B.S. Haldane)

Divine Will.quote: Not my will, but Yours be done. (Luke 22:42)

Destined Events.quote: What is meant to be will always find its way. (Persian Proverb)

Divine Timing.quote: Everything happens at the appointed time. (Ecclesiastes 3:11)

Soul Contract.quote: Every soul has made a covenant with the Divine before coming to earth. (Islamic Tradition)

Divine Providence.quote: In all your ways acknowledge Him, and He will make straight your paths. (Proverbs 3:6)

Cosmic Pattern.quote: As above, so below; as within, so without. (Hermes Trismegistus)

Sacred Mission.quote: Each being has a sacred mission in the grand tapestry of existence. (Native American Teaching)

Divine Alignment.quote: When you align with your destiny, the universe conspires to help you. (Paulo Coelho)

Karmic Cycles.quote: The wheel of karma turns inexorably. (Buddhist Teaching)

Divine Intervention.quote: God writes straight with crooked lines. (Portuguese Proverb)

Destiny Markers.quote: Signs and synchronicities mark the path of destiny. (Carl Jung)

Divine Blueprint.quote: Your life was written before you were born. (Psalm 139:16)

Sacred Purpose.quote: Everyone has a purpose in life... a unique gift or special talent to give to others. (Deepak Chopra)

Divine Orchestration.quote: All things work together for good to those who love God. (Romans 8:28)
